summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6677 for the improvement of the alley in Block 4, Rosenbaum Spring Hill Addition No. 1, being the alley between 40th Ave S.W. and Fauntleroy Way S.W. from S.W. Dawson St. to S.W. Hudson St.; by paving etc., under Ordinance No. 105772, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
